content: I like the idea of a staggered arrangement, but I'm not sure about the frames. My artwork is pretty eclectic, with some bold colors and some more muted tones. Do you think it's better to choose frames that match the dominant colors in each piece, or go for a more neutral frame that won't compete with the artwork? By the way, I've been spending a lot of time in my living room lately, especially since I rearranged the furniture a few weeks ago. It's really opened up the space and made it feel more airy.
